'''1.5.2''' is a minor update to the [[launcher]] released on August 18, 2014.

== Changes ==
* Re-launching ''Minecraft'' with a user used previously will override the game output tab for that user.

== Fixes ==
* [[bugtracker:MCL-2964|MCL-2964]] – Inherited JSON is overwritten when a library download takes place.
